Container.Name: CubeBackup-Microsoft365
Container.Overview: Self-hosted backup for Microsoft 365. Protect OneDrive, Exchange Online, and SharePoint Online data with Cube Backup.

Config.Name: Index
Config.Description: Location of the data index. The access speed of the data index is crucially important for the performance of the backup. Should be on cache or SSD pool.

Config.Name: Backup Location
Config.Description: Location of the backup data, likely will be on a share on your array.

Config.Name: Config
Config.Description: Directory is the location to store the main configuration file (config.toml) for the CubeBackup app.

Config.Name: Data
Config.Description: Directory is the location to store the other application settings, key files, and an SQLite database for sessions.

Config.Name: Logs
Config.Description: Directory stores log files for CubeBackup.
